# modus-buttongroup



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                             | Type                    | Default                |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `ariaLabel`     | `aria-label`     | (optional) The selection type of button | `string`                | `undefined`            |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | (optional) Disables the button.         | `boolean`               | `undefined`            |
| `selectionType` | `selection-type` | (optional) The button's aria-label.     | `"default" \| "single"` | `DEFAULT_SELECT__TYPE` |


## Events

| Event             | Description                            | Type                                    |
| ----------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `buttonsSelected` | Event emitted when a button is clicked | `CustomEvent<HTMLModusButtonElement[]>` |
